name: Candidemia
content: Candidella is a genus of corals belonging to the family Primnoidae. The species of this genus are found in Atlantic and Pacific Ocean. Species:  Candidella gigantea (Wright & Studer, 1889) Candidella helminthophora (Nutting, 1908) Candidella imbricata (Johnson, 1862) Candidella johnsoni (Wright & Studer, 1889)   == References ==
